jhelp.android.api.text2speech

Class TextToSpeechManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • jhelp.android.api.text2speech.TextToSpeechManagerService

  • public class TextToSpeechManagerService
extends Service
    Service that manage text to speach.
    It manages text queue, priority and access to text to speach
    Author:
    JHelp
